General.Name: PLB Engineering Bhd
General.Description: PLB Engineering Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the contracting and construction of industrial, residential, and commercial building and renovation work in Malaysia. The company operates through Construction, Property Development, Trading, Property Letting, Waste Management, Solar Energy, Investment Holding, and Others segments. It is also involved in the housing and property development activities; letting of properties; manufacture and trading of bricks; rental of machinery; manufacture and trading of waste recyclable materials; and provision of waste management, green waste management, and wood shredding services. In addition, the company provides manufacturing and advisory, and solar energy services; generates electricity from the solar plant; and trades in construction materials. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Perai, Malaysia. PLB Engineering Berhad is a subsidiary of Leading Builders Sdn. Bhd.
